inputs.name: authenticationType
inputs.label: Authentication type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authentication via username/password is simpler to set up but won't work if your AAD tenant requires MFA; use Service Principal Name (SPN) if MFA is required.

inputs.name: PowerPlatformEnvironment
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authenticate with your Power Platform environment with username/password. Does not support MFA.

inputs.name: PowerPlatformSPN
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authenticate with your Power Platform environment with an Azure AppID, tenantID and client secret.

inputs.name: Environment
inputs.label: Environment Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Environment url this task targets; default is the pipeline variable that e.g. the CreateEnvironment task has set before.

inputs.name: SolutionName
inputs.label: Solution Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the solution to export.

inputs.name: SolutionOutputFile
inputs.label: Solution Output File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path and file name of the generated zip file.

inputs.name: Managed
inputs.label: Export as Managed Solution
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify whether to export as managed or unmanaged.

inputs.name: TargetVersion
inputs.label: Target Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: DEPRECATED: **ignored** Version of solution to export.

inputs.name: AsyncOperation
inputs.label: Export solution as asynchronous operation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Export solution as asynchronous batch job; selecting asynchronous will poll and wait until MaxAsyncWaitTime has been reached.

inputs.name: MaxAsyncWaitTime
inputs.label: Maximum wait time in minutes for asynchronous operation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum wait time in minutes for asynchronous Export; default is 60 min (1 hr), same as Azure DevOps default for tasks

inputs.name: OverwriteLocalSolution
inputs.label: Overwrite the local solution.zip copy
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, task will overwrite a solution.zip of the same name on the agent's local file system.
